duties_responsibilities.duty: Excel in hard bid estimating and conceptual budgeting.
Prepare detailed cost analyses, including material, labor, and overhead.
Review construction documents to understand the scope of work.
Obtain and analyze bids from vendors and subcontractors.
Develop and maintain a list of top-notch products, vendors, and subcontractors.
Forge and sustain relationships with key industry players.
Be the voice of financial wisdom in project meetings and pre-bid walk-throughs.
Utilize cutting-edge estimating software to perfect bids.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree and a minimum of ten years of related experience, or an equivalent combination of training and experience.
